name: Shipping via Nova Poshta for WooCommerce
author: Extrawest

sections.description:
This free plugin integrates Ukrainian post service “Nova Poshta” to any Woocommerce platform.
By installing it to your admin panel, you could select a special post department from a list, calculate the shipping cost, configure the destination location and choose a cargo type for the product.
To keep a department list up-to-date we’ve implemented a synchronization functionality, thereby all-new post affiliates will always be available.
Nova Poshta Plugin is the smartest way to integrate the most convenient and trusted delivery to your platform.
sections.installation:
1. Get API Key of Nova Poshta in user panel on novaposhta.com.ua.
  2. Insert your API key on plugin settings page for getting access to Nova Poshta API.
  3. Synchronize adresses from Nova Poshta by pressing button “Синхронізувати Довідник Адрес НП” in plugin settings page.
  4. Set Ukraine shipping zone in Woocommerce shipping settings.
  5. Enable Nova Poshta shipping method on plugin settings page or woocommerce shipping settings page.
sections.faq:
Q: Why “Nova Poshta” shipping method isn`t available?
A: Please set Ukraine shipping zone in Woocommerce shipping settings.
Q: Where i can set cargo type of product?
A: In shipping options of product.
